reviewText: Better than the first one, with a better 3D and a closer camera to look at the pets, it also lacks a button to accelerate the time. 2 hours (of real time) to take care of 4 bunnies, it's really too long !

reviewText: I would not rcommend this game to anyone, even someone I was trying to bore to death. The instructions, if you can call them that, do not give you much insight as to what needs to be done. The voice used is really annoying and the after 30 minutes of play (if you could call it that) I quit and removed this from my computer. It was a complete waste of less than $3.00 and a bad idea in general.
